00010         class AssetController extends EmeController
00011         {
00012                 protected function init()
00013                 {
00014                         $this->after_filter('compress');
00015                 }
00016                 
00017                 public function index()
00018                 {
00019                         switch ($_GET['ext'])
00020                         {
00021                                 case 'js':
00022                                         $this->mimetype = 'application/x-javascript';
00023                                         break;
00024                                 case 'rss':
00025                                         $this->mimetype = 'application/rss+xml';
00026                                         break;
00027                                 case 'xml':
00028                                         $this->mimetype = 'text/xml';
00029                                         break;
00030                                 case 'css':
00031                                         $this->mimetype = 'text/css';
00032                                         break;
00033                                 default:
00034                                         $this->mimetype = 'text/plain';
00035                         }
00036                         $asset_file = "{$_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']}/assets/{$_GET['dir']}/{$_GET['file']}.{$_GET['ext']}";
00037                         
00038                         $this->response->body = file_get_contents($asset_file);
00039 
00040                         $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00041                         $this->response->add_header('Cache-Control', 'max-age=86400');
00042                         $this->response->add_header('Pragma', 'max-age=86400');
00043                         $this->response->add_header('Last-Modified', gmstrftime("%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z", filemtime($asset_file)));
00044                         $this->response->add_header('Date', gmstrftime("%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z"));
00045                         $this->response->add_header('Expires', gmstrftime("%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z", time() + 86400));
00046 
00047                         $this->render(NULL);
00048                 }
00049         }
